articles.title: Mercedes-Benz Energy to repurpose EV batteries; inks partnership with Indian startup Lohum - Economic Times
articles.description: MBE and Lohum have been working together for nearly two years. The agreement will enable Lohum to secure high volumes of second-use battery modules from MBE. Once these second life modules reach end-of-life, Lohum will offer a buy-back guarantee to recycle th…
articles.content:
Indian battery recycling startup Lohum said it has inked a strategic partnership with Mercedes-Benz Energy to repurpose batteries of electric vehicles.
